Column.Name: Procurement Officer - Conflict of Interest Declaration Complete
Risk Rating
COI Text
Column.DefaultValueFormula: DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY("Standard Text", "Standard Text 2"), "Conflict of Interest Declaration - Standard Text" )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Conflict Logged
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( $thisValue <> TRUE, [Confirm Decision] = "Agreed: Conflicts acknowledged" ), "Please log conflicts to choose agree with conflicts acknowledged", AND( $thisValue = TRUE, [Confirm Decision] = "Agreed: No conflicts" ), "You cannot agree with no conflicts when there are conflicts logged", TRUE )

Binding.Expression:
"
" & "I, " & [Name of User] & ", " & [Standard Text] & "
"

Information.Text: This weight is relative to the questions within this category.

Label.Text: Dispose any documents once you have finished evaluation if you have downloaded them from the system previously.
I have read and understood the above declaration. I have complied with my public authority conflict and confidentiality policies and if required disclosed all actual and perceived conflicts.

FieldEntry.Formula: "Conflict of interest declared by " &[Name of User]& " in relation to Procurement "& [Procurement Number]& " - '"&[Procurement Title]& "'"

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula:
HASH( "Decision", [Confirm Decision],
"Notify PO", OR( [Confirm Decision] = "Not agreed", [Confirm Decision] = "Agreed: Conflicts acknowledged" ),
"Update Evaluation", [Confirm Decision] = "Not Agreed" )

Binding.Expression:
LET $text := IF( [Confirm Decision] = "Agreed: No conflicts", "agree with no conflict", [Confirm Decision] = "Agreed: Conflicts acknowledged", "agree with conflicts acknowledged", [Confirm Decision] = "Not agreed", "do not agree" ); RETURN "
Are you sure you " & $text & " with this COI Declaration? " & IF( OR( [Confirm Decision] = "Agreed: Conflicts acknowledged", [Confirm Decision] = "Not agreed" ), "
The procurement officer will be notified of this decision." ) & "
"
AND( [Confirm Decision] <> NULL, OR( [COI - Change Decision] == TRUE, [Status] = "Pending Decision" ) )
AND( [COI - Change Decision] <> TRUE, OR( [Status] == "Agreed: No conflicts", [Status] == "Agreed: Conflicts acknowledged", [Status] == "Not agreed" ) )

TextCriterion.Text: CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee]

STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee]

STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE
-- check if the user is in a role which always has access to the COI declaration WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee] THEN TRUE
-- If the COI is pre-market, check that the user has access to the parent Procurement WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Pre-Market' THEN ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Approvers' )
-- If the COI is pre-Evaluation, check that the user is the Procurement Manager/Officer for the Evaluation WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Evaluation RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE
-- check if the user is in a role which always has access to the COI declaration WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee] THEN TRUE
-- If the COI is pre-market, check that the user has access to the parent Procurement WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Pre-Market' THEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- If the COI is pre-Evaluation, check that the user is the Procurement Manager/Officer for the Evaluation WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Evaluation RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee] THEN TRUE
-- If the COI is pre-market, check that the user is the Procurement Manager/Officer for the Procurement WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Pre-Market' THEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- If the COI is pre-Evaluation, check that the user is the Procurement Manager/Officer for the Evaluation WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Evaluation RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Call: Create Individual Evaluation Records (on Evaluate)

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Status] = "Declined", "Cancelled",
target.[Date Completed]<> NULL(), "Submitted",
target.[Total Score]>0, "In Progress",
"Not Started"
)
